concept.title: Prerequisites
concept.shortdesc: Several prerequisites are required to get up and running with the Couchbase .NET SDK Beer Sample Application.

ul.li: Couchbase Server 2.5 or later installed locally (you can always use a remote cluster, you'll just have to configure your application accordingly)

conbody.note: Other versions of Visual Studio or NuGet might work, but this tutorial has not been tested with them.
